keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
flavor: For the uninitiated, the Grand Scheme will manifest itself as an avalanche: a series of seemingly insignificant events putting the entire mountain slope in motion to sweep away the ancien régime. Only the madmen and the thorough historians, studying the developments of these days in retrospect, many decades later, will discover the truth:  it was a mechanism as precise as a clock, counting down to the advent of a new world order.

name: Prophet
ability:
Deploy: Damage self by 2, then Lock all units in your opponent's hand until the end of round. The next time your opponent plays a Locked unit, remove Lock from all units in your opponent's hand.
Adrenaline 2: Lock self instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage self by 2, then Lock all units in your opponent's hand until the end of round. The next time your opponent plays a Locked unit, remove Lock from all units in your opponent's hand. Adrenaline 2: Lock self instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
flavor: In his vision, he saw a mage beckon to a black sky as it split open. From the breach, he saw an enormous monstrosity with hooked limbs descending upon a city, smashing and crushing it to rubble. He saw destruction, death, and chaos incarnate, and he was paralysed with fear.

name: Beauclair
ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Set an allied unit's power to match the highest-power enemy unit.
Order: Reset the power of a unit.
ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Set an allied unit's power to match the highest-power enemy unit. Order: Reset the power of a unit.
keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Beauclair, with its ivory spires and amber rooftops against the backdrop of Mount Gorgon, embodies the essential Toussaint: it never feels like anything other than a fairy tale.

name: Guillaume de Launfal
ability:
Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Knights on this row, then boost self and an enemy unit by half of both units' power.
Order (Grace 14): Move all statuses from an enemy unit to self.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Knights on this row, then boost self and an enemy unit by half of both units' power. Order (Grace 14): Move all statuses from an enemy unit to self.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
flavor: A true exemplar of the five knightly virtues, save perhaps wisdom.

name: Buhurt
ability: Boost an enemy unit by 3, then an allied unit by 9.
ability_html: Boost an enemy unit by 3, then an allied unit by 9.
flavor: The one ONLY absolute iron-clad rule is: no crotch shots!

name: Knight Challenger
ability:
Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to the amount of boost an enemy unit has.
Grace 8: Boost all units by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Gain Vitality equal to the amount of boost an enemy unit has. Grace 8: Boost all units by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Grace: The first time this unit's power is equal to or higher than the specified amount, trigger the ability. If the condition is already met when it enters the battlefield, trigger it immediately.
flavor: While you were studying the blade, he mastered his hair.

name: Ace up the Sleeve
ability:
Doomed.
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Doomed. Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Twinkle-twinkle shooting star,\nHow it leaves a lasting scar.

name: Ard Feainn
ability:
Resilience.
Order: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, and choose one to move to the bottom.
If it was an Agent, give an enemy unit Spying. If it was an Aristocrat, give an enemy unit Bleeding (2).
Whenever you play an Aristocrat, refresh the Order.
While in deck, when you play a gold Aristocrat, Summon self to your Melee row.
ability_html: Resilience. Order: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, and choose one to move to the bottom. If it was an Agent, give an enemy unit Spying. If it was an Aristocrat, give an enemy unit Bleeding (2). Whenever you play an Aristocrat, refresh the Order. While in deck, when you play a gold Aristocrat, Summon self to your Melee row.
keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: The Great Sun does not extend its light to those destined for the gutters.

name: Torres var Emreis: Founder
ability:
Doomed.
Deploy: Give Spying to 3 units with provision costs of 10 or less from your opponent's deck, then Spawn base copies of them into your deck. Boost self by 1 for each provision below the limit.
Order: Banish up to 3 cards from your starting deck from your deck.
While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
ability_html: Doomed. Deploy: Give Spying to 3 units with provision costs of 10 or less from your opponent's deck, then Spawn base copies of them into your deck. Boost self by 1 for each provision below the limit. Order: Banish up to 3 cards from your starting deck from your deck. While in hand or deck, evolve after you win a round.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
flavor: Like emperor, like empire: Grandiose, entitled, and hell-bent.

name: Torres var Emreis: Highest Priest
ability:
Doomed.
Assimilate.
Deploy: Move a non-Doomed allied unit that is not from your starting deck, excluding self, back to your hand, boost it by 2 and give it Doomed, then play a card.
If there is no valid target, Create and play a bronze unit from your opponent's faction and boost it by 2 instead.
ability_html: Doomed. Assimilate. Deploy: Move a non-Doomed allied unit that is not from your starting deck, excluding self, back to your hand, boost it by 2 and give it Doomed, then play a card. If there is no valid target, Create and play a bronze unit from your opponent's faction and boost it by 2 instead.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield. Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: Like emperor, like empire: Grandiose, entitled, and hell-bent.

name: Abduction
ability:
Echo.
Play a unit that isn't from your opponent's starting deck from their deck with a provision cost of 10 or less. Boost it by 1 for each provision below the limit.
ability_html: Echo. Play a unit that isn't from your opponent's starting deck from their deck with a provision cost of 10 or less. Boost it by 1 for each provision below the limit.
keyword_html: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
flavor: Steady, steady, just a little lower... There we go. That thing ate the Captain's helmet. We'll need to get it back.

name: Sandor de Baccalà
ability:
Deploy: Shuffle a card from your deck into your opponent's deck.
Order: Spawn a Drone at the bottom of your opponent's deck and set its power to the difference between the number of cards in the players' decks.
Whenever a card enters or leaves your opponent's deck, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Shuffle a card from your deck into your opponent's deck. Order: Spawn a Drone at the bottom of your opponent's deck and set its power to the difference between the number of cards in the players' decks. Whenever a card enters or leaves your opponent's deck, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Having been denied a rightful tract of land by his duke of an uncle, Sandor set out to build his own duchy from the ground up, starting with the realm of seedy, bottom-shelf operations within the Imperial Military Intelligence best suited for fools and madmen...

name: Contaminator
ability: Deploy: Banish an enemy unit with 3 or less power, then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Banish an enemy unit with 3 or less power, then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Destroying the supplies was merely a convenient side effect of the main goal: make them believe the food from their allies is tainted, and leave them with a choice: Nilfgaard or famine.

name: Toxicologist
ability: Deploy: Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever a card enters or leaves your deck, damage self by 1", then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
ability_html: Deploy: Infuse an enemy unit with "Whenever a card enters or leaves your deck, damage self by 1", then, if it wasn't a Token, Spawn its base copy at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Voted least likely to live to old age by the other chemists in the academy. And that was really saying something.

name: Baccalà
ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn Imperial Fleet to the left of self and Imperial Marine to the right of self.
Order: Boost 2 allied units by 2 and swap their positions.
ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Spawn Imperial Fleet to the left of self and Imperial Marine to the right of self. Order: Boost 2 allied units by 2 and swap their positions.
keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Ever hungry for tar and timber, for cloth and cable, for lard and labor. It's a point of pride for Baccalà that thirty fresh frigates leave its shipyard every year.

name: Admiral Rompally
ability:
Zeal. Order: Choose 3 enemy units, then give them Lock, Poison and Spying, in that order.
At the end of your turn, boost self by the highest number of statuses on an enemy unit.
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Choose 3 enemy units, then give them Lock, Poison and Spying, in that order. At the end of your turn, boost self by the highest number of statuses on an enemy unit.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
flavor: Some call him a hero, some call him a genius. Others prefer to call him a pompous prick. Funnily enough, all are in the right.

name: The Catriona
ability:
Flanking. 
Order: Poison a non-Poisoned unit with at least 1 status.
At the end of your turn, gain a Charge.
Charge: 1
ability_html: Flanking. Order: Poison a non-Poisoned unit with at least 1 status. At the end of your turn, gain a Charge. Charge: 1
keyword_html: Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: This humble, rat-infested excuse for a hulk will go down in history as the harbinger of plague.

name: Battle Stations!
ability: Play up to 2 bronze cards from your hand, then draw as many cards.
ability_html: Play up to 2 bronze cards from your hand, then draw as many cards.
flavor: Those who desire hegemony over the seas must be ready to pay for it with blood.

name: Imperial Fleet
ability:
Zeal. Order: Infuse an enemy unit with "At the end of your turn, damage self for each active Flanking unit on the opposite row".
Charge: 1
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Infuse an enemy unit with "At the end of your turn, damage self for each active Flanking unit on the opposite row". Charge: 1
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Infused: Status that adds effects or categories to a card. Removing the status also removes all added effects and categories. Lock disables Infused abilities. Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Sirens scatter, tritons tremble, krakens burrow in the mud when the Emperor's mighty fleet ventures forth to rule the waves!

name: Imperial Marine
ability:
Flanking.
Zeal. Order: Choose a card from your deck.
At the end of your turn, move it up by one position in your deck. If it's on the top, boost self by 1 instead.
ability_html: Flanking. Zeal. Order: Choose a card from your deck. At the end of your turn, move it up by one position in your deck. If it's on the top, boost self by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Flanking: If this unit is adjacent to only one card: on your Melee row, its end of turn ability is triggered twice; on your Ranged row, gain 1 Armor at the end of your turn. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: The canvas to trap the winds, the ropes to direct them, and the muscle to pull the ropes—all necessary components of a sea-going vessel.

name: Henry var Attre
ability: Deploy: If your opponent has not passed and their hand is not full, Create a legendary unit from your faction that was not in your starting deck, add it to your opponent's hand, move the rest to the bottom of your opponent's deck, then Create a legendary unit from your opponent's faction that was not in their starting deck, add it to your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck.
ability_html: Deploy: If your opponent has not passed and their hand is not full, Create a legendary unit from your faction that was not in your starting deck, add it to your opponent's hand, move the rest to the bottom of your opponent's deck, then Create a legendary unit from your opponent's faction that was not in their starting deck, add it to your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
flavor: The line between diplomacy and espionage is a thin one, especially in Nilfgaard.

name: Rosa and Edna var Attre
ability:
Deploy: Create a bronze unit from your opponent's faction, then Spawn it on the opposite row and give it Spying.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 0. Increase this value by 1 for each unique Aristocrat in your starting deck.
Deathblow: Spawn and play a Doomed base copy of the destroyed unit.
ability_html: Deploy: Create a bronze unit from your opponent's faction, then Spawn it on the opposite row and give it Spying. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 0. Increase this value by 1 for each unique Aristocrat in your starting deck. Deathblow: Spawn and play a Doomed base copy of the destroyed unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit. Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Double trouble!
